mapper.sql: id, correction_unit, sentence_user, sentence_user_id, ways_date, analysis_situation, correction_opinion, remark, handle_correction_id, org_num, create_time, update_time, creator, updater, deleted

correctionWays.id,correctionWays.correction_unit AS correctionUnit,correctionWays.sentence_user AS sentenceUser,correctionWays.sentence_user_id AS sentenceUserId,correctionWays.ways_date AS waysDate,correctionWays.analysis_situation AS analysisSituation,correctionWays.correction_opinion AS correctionOpinion,correctionWays.remark,correctionWays.handle_correction_id AS handleCorrectionId,correctionWays.org_num AS orgNum,correctionWays.create_time AS createTime,correctionWays.update_time AS updateTime,correctionWays.creator,correctionWays.updater,correctionWays.deleted
